website_summaries.verdict: Exposed shearling fur adds a wintery flair to this ankle height UGG boot.
pros: Generously lined sheepskin boot with exposed shearling fur
Liner provides warmth and is good at pulling moisture away from the foot
Protects from cold weather and features a cute side bow detail
Made of durable materials – should last all winter long
cons: Many have issues with proper sizing

customer_reviews.title: Size Up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in September which here in the South still means sandals weather. My daughter tried them on and they were fine. She went to wear them recently and found that when she walked in them they were much more snug than she initially thought. I suppose it is possible that her feet have grown .5 size in two months but not likely. Very cushy though.
customer_reviews.author: Only One Mommy

customer_reviews.title: A kids 6 is equivalent to a Women’s 8!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these Uggs!! I usually buy Women’s size 8 but I chose to buy these Kids ones in a 6 & they fit the same as a women’s pair would!! I’m so happy w/my purchase especially because I’ve never seen these Uggs in Women’s before!! I can’t wait to wear them & show off my “New” Uggs!!
customer_reviews.author: JERZ2FULLEST

customer_reviews.title: ... boots that are the same size and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had these for a year but they were way too big but she has other Ugg boots that are the same size and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: nwarr

customer_reviews.title: MY DAUGHTER LOVES THESE BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted these boots for Christmas, she is 15 years old with very small feet, I was concerned since I was buying a child size they would not fit, they fit perfect, and they are so cute and a unique color so everyone will not be sporting them this winter. I love UGGs for my girls.
customer_reviews.author: Pauletta

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in person and fit is great.
customer_reviews.text: I always buy my daughter one pair of Uggs to make it through the winter. These were her choice and they are beautiful. Fit great and look like they will last quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: we loved them. But you should treat them before wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: we loved them. But you should treat them before wearing with the Ugg brand treatment kit. We tried the other brand found at shoes store and it messed up our previous uggs
customer_reviews.author: San L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are too large. My daughter had narrow feet so I had to return them..
customer_reviews.author: S.D

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved this boot.
customer_reviews.text: I asked my granddaughter how she liked her gift and she gave it a resounding 'I LOVE IT!!' Although a bit pricey for a growing preteen, I am glad she loved it and she said it was so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: avdreadr

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit, need a size larger
customer_reviews.text: was surprised these uggs didn't fit comfortably on my daughter; uggs are suppoesed to come on easily, however these needed to be pulled up and tugged quite a bit will try a size larger, hope they are not too big!
customer_reviews.author: George K. Andonian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are wonderful!! Wore them all winter and will treasure them for years to come!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Egleston Allison

customer_reviews.title: Nana
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter and she simply loves them
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Uggs, I'm ordering for my self, adult size 7-7.5 kids 6
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: the boots were too small, but other than that my daughter loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boot but they fit a bit too small around ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boot but they fit a bit too small around ankle. Kinda cut into top of my foot at the seam.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my daughter and she's very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute boot. I purchased this for my daughter and she's very happy.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: great boot
customer_reviews.text: Fir her perfect- she loves them- its like walking on sunshine!
customer_reviews.author: Tayler West

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Feel so comfortable and fit good. It was time to replace my old ones and these were the perfect fit. I am a 7 women's size and the kids size 6 fit perfect with a little extra comfy room! I also bought my daughter the size toddler 10! We love our shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but sized incorrectly
customer_reviews.text: Super cute boot, much too large and wide. My daughter wears a 4 girls, I ordered a 4, sent that back and tried a size 3. She is still swimming in the size 3. She fell in love with them and they were out of the size 2, so we will have to keep for a year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi C.

customer_reviews.title: The shoes were great, fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: The shipment was on time. The shoes were great, fit as expected. Overall a great experience
customer_reviews.author: Ekr0529

customer_reviews.title: Bows with a twist
customer_reviews.text: These UGGS turn lots of heads...different from your usual Bailey Bow.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos from NY

customer_reviews.title: The boots were beautiful but i did not like that we had to ...
customer_reviews.text: The boots were beautiful but i did not like that we had to pay 20.00 for shipping to return the boots.
customer_reviews.author: i love it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ordered these for my step daughter and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Nora B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered four days before Christmas and they arrived on time. They fit my granddaughter perfectly. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Liz P

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Very cute boots and super comfy. I wear a size 6 women's and ordered a size 5 in the kids and they fit perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I WAS VERY SATISFIED WITH MY PURCHASE AND THE SPEEDY DELIVERY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These came very fast. Authentic Ugh boots as promised. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your ugg boots are amazing they are really soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Your ugg boots are amazing they are really soft and comfortable. My daughter loves them and the first time she wore them she didn't want to take them off
customer_reviews.author: Andrzej Kulis

customer_reviews.title: The bows continued falling off of these boots.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are extremely cute and we were happy with them to begin with. After the second wear, one bow fell off, so I sewed it back on, then the other bow fell off, so I sewed that one back on. Now they have BOTH fallen off and one of the bows is lost! She won't wear them now because the bow made them as cute as they are!!!! She has worn them maybe a dozen times. I'm NOT happy with the purchase of these Uggs and would never buy this style again!
customer_reviews.author: dorman

customer_reviews.title: Although they arrived late for Christmas, when they did ...
customer_reviews.text: Although they arrived late for Christmas ,when they did arrive they lit up my granddaughters eyes and she wears them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit was good but one of the bows feel off after just two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Never received item

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my 8 year old for Christmas and this week is the first week she has worn them and one bow has already fallen off and was lost. I am beyond upset and so is she.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weijers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They were too big and bow was not sew on correctly
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: They were too cute and looked extremely comfortable. She had them on less than 2 min
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 yr old. She cried and cried saying they hurt her feet. They were too cute and looked extremely comfortable. She had them on less than 2 min...
customer_reviews.author: Natorsha R. York

customer_reviews.title: The bow pops right off of it, if you ...
customer_reviews.text: The bow pops right off of it, if you are buying it because you think the bow is cute there is no point.
customer_reviews.author: Elida Martes

product_meta.title: UGG Kids' Kourtney (Little Big
product_meta.description: The Australia Kourtney Girls Boots brings on a playful twist to the adorable classic UGG boot, every girl will love The Kourtney Boot. The suede upper with nylon binding looks great and is very durable - to take on what you put out. Adding the delicate bow accent sets this boot apart from others, giving you an original well designed fashion boot. The slip on styling makes for easy on and off. The exposed collar with billowing fur coming off the top of the boot adds toasty warmth. The Kourtney Boot will complete any casual outfit, as you make a cute fashion statement you will walk in total comfort and the inner sock naturally wicks away moisture, keeping feet warm and dry. Warranty: One Year, Waterproof: No, Material: Suede, Type: Boot, Insulated: Yes, Sole Material: Rubber foam, Model Year: 2016, Product ID: 359886, Model Number: 1005398K BLK 3, GTIN: 0887278898818
feature_bullets: Suede short height boot with bow
